subdisciplines.name: Speech Act Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people use language to perform various acts, such as making requests, giving orders, and promising.

subdisciplines.name: Conversational Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people structure conversations, including turn-taking, topic shifts, and repair.

subdisciplines.name: Intercultural Pragmatics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how language use varies across cultures, and how people from different cultures interpret linguistic behaviors.
